Description: Round-topped limestone stela(unfinished) divided into three registers: 1 - Winged sun-disc with uraei above thirteen lines of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Scene of the deceased seated before offering-tables and four figures. 3 - Seven standing female figures.
Curator's comments: Published: PM V: p.95. Translation: Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Autobiographies (OBO 84): p.94-95
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.6)
